titles.title: Disclosing Investments in Foreign Adversaries Act of 2025
Disclosing Investments in Foreign Adversaries Act of 2025
A bill to require the Securities and Exchange Commission to amend the rules of the Commission relating to disclosures by advisers of private funds, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs.
